titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the unreasonableness of a new separation, on account of the oaths with an answer to the History of passive obedience, so far as relates to them.
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stillingfleet. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
